scope.description: list of Scopes separated by spaces.

verificationToken.description: Required if scope includes a scope which require two-factor authentication. Received as a response from Create Customer Token Verification.

jwtToken.description: Required if scope includes a scope which require two-factor authentication. Should be in a valid JWT structure.

expiresIn.description: Optional. The lifetime of the token (in seconds). Maximum value is 86400 (24 hours). Default value is also 24 hours.

verificationCode.description: Required if the scope attribute includes a scope which requires two-factor authentication. 6 digits code sent to the customer through the desired channel.

resources.description: Optional. Restrict token to one or more specific resources. To one or many cards and/or to one or many accounts (cards under it, payments, transactions). See [Restricted Resources](https://www.unit.co/docs/api/resources/#restricted-resources).

upgradableScope.description: Optional. list of Scopes separated by spaces. The customer will be able to upgrade the token to the scopes you provide here. customer-token-write scope is required when setting this attribute.
